duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive organizational change through the development, implementation, and execution of strategic programs for enterprise risk across the Bank.
Direct programs to monitor effectiveness of enterprise controls and timely identification and resolution of enterprise risk issues, as well as identification of enterprise trends within both.
Direct processes for ensuring timely, comprehensive, and effective risk reporting to appropriate risk owned governance groups.
Responsible for development and ownership of technology solutions that address risk mitigation and facilitate efficient and effective execution of risk programs.
Build and maintain influential relationships with senior management and provide support to management or board committees.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Enterprise Risk or Operational Risk and Project Management or Consulting (internal or external) with 10 years of experience OR High School Diploma or GED with 14 years of experience in the same field.
